description: This private pre-war 1bdr. apartment  is spacious, quiet and clean. Enjoy your morning coffee as you take in a view of Manhattan. Just 1 block away from Roosevelt Ave/74th st. express stop and 15 mins to city. Delicious spicy food nearby. A true New Yorker's apartment.
name: Charming 1 bdr apt. just 17 mins from MANHATTAN!
review: We had a great time at Ryan's place. Ryan and Ayanna  were extremely helpful and friendly. They were fast with their responses and flexible with requests. The apartment is located in a nice safe locale with plenty of South Asian eateries and stores around. We loved that it was a short metro ride to Manhattan. The apartment is tastefully furnished and had all the amenities advertised. We would definitely recommend this apartment.
